sources.title: Blood Feast(1963) HD VERSION
sources.description: Now in high definitionÂ  Disclaimer: This is an early gore film AKA splatter film. WARNING: GRAPHIC VIOLENCE AND GORE! VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED! Plot: An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to revive a dormant Egyptian goddess while an inept police detective tries to track him down.

sources.title: Blood Feast 1963
sources.description: A successful caterer with a sinister hobby plans on using a large upcoming event to make many human sacrifices to reincarnate the Egyptian goddess Ishtar.

metadata.Plot: An Egyptian caterer busies himself collecting body parts from young maidens to bring Ishtar, an ancient goddess of good and evil, back to life. When he has prepared enough parts for the ceremony, he hypnotizes a woman giving an engagement party for her daughter, at which he plans to perform the ancient rites of summons, using the daughter as his final sacrifice.
metadata.Writer: Louise Downe, David F. Friedman, Herschell Gordon Lewis
metadata.Actors: William Kerwin, Mal Arnold, Connie Mason
